title: Everyone needs a PDF editor and this one is $20 off
description:
Given how frequently we work with PDFs in the digital age, you’d think there would be a better standard software for editing and managing them. Unfortunately, most of us have to splurge for extra software. But you don’t need to splurge much, because a lifetime license to AcePDF Editor & Converter is 33% off now.

AcePDF is an intuitive PDF editing tool that lets you seamlessly edit and annotate PDFs without having to download them and convert them to new formats. You can change text and images without leaving the PDF, but if you do need to convert, AcePDF makes it easy to move to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and many more file types in a matter of seconds without losing the original layout or quality.

AcePDF also makes it easy to manage pages, split PDF files into multiple files, merge separate files, compress files, utilize OCR in 20 languages, and much more.

User Aurora writes, “It’s an easy-to-use PDF editor with all the basic editing features provided: editing, splitting, merging, etc. It’s worthy of recommendation as an ultimate PDF solution as all the conversion and editing tools are provided.”

Make working with PDFs easier than ever. Get a lifetime license to AcePDF Editor & Converter for 33% off $59.99 at just $39.99 now.
